src:
WATCH | Delhi air pollution drops to worst level - 'like smoking 50 cigarettes a day'

03 Nov 2019, 19:43

Air quality has dropped to its worst recorded level this year in New Delhi and nearby cities, with a thick haze hanging over the Indian capital.
text:
WATCH | Delhi air pollution drops to worst level - 'like smoking 50 cigarettes a day'

03 Nov 2019, 19:43

Air quality has dropped to its worst recorded level this year in New Delhi and nearby cities, with a thick haze hanging over the Indian capital.
